com.example.oose.routemaker.CreateTrip

Class SelectSiteActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.app.Activity
      • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
        • android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
          • com.example.oose.routemaker.CreateTrip.SelectSiteActivity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, android.support.v4.app.ActivityCompatApi23.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, android.support.v4.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, android.support.v7.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, android.support.v7.app.AppCompatCallback, Communicator, com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback

    public class SelectSiteActivity
extends android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback, Communicator
    User can select multiple sites for each day. We show them the sites according to category. After the user selects a bunch of sites here, we direct them to the editschedule activity and use the initial list of sites to run TSP.

      List of sites the user picked for a particular day.
